title: Five-Star Italian Luxury Amid Tuscany’s Rolling Hills
description: Embrace the laid-back lifestyle of the Tuscan countryside, staying in a picturesque village that has been transformed into a five-star hotel: Il Castelfalfi. Winner of the Best Luxury Wine Estate Hotel at the 2018 World Luxury Hotel Awards, this idyllic hotel is a five-star oasis nestled amid the rolling hills of Tuscany sure to give you a quintessential Italian experience. Slow down the pace as you enjoy daily American buffet breakfast, a three-course dinner during your stay, a welcome drink on arrival, 15% discount for the resort’s golf club and tennis courts, 10% discount on spa treatments and complimentary access to all its facilities.
offer_address: 50050 Montaione, Metropolitan City of Florence, Italy

title: Heritage Tuscany Countryside Escape near Montepulciano with Daily Breakfast & Onsite Spa
description:
On the outskirts of Montepulciano - renowned for its hillside views, medieval terraces and legendary vineyards - stands this sanctuary of rustic luxury. Home to 60 rooms and suites, the historic residence showcases frescos reaching towards vaulted ceilings, traditional flourishes throughout and lush gardens providing a contrast against cinematic interiors.

Return from days exploring the countryside to playful Tuscan plates at La Via della Seta, sip aperitifs by the shimmering outdoor pool or allow the hotel’s master sommeliers to guide you on a journey through the region’s rich viticultural heritage.

Ready to explore? Montepulciano is brimming with exquisite sights and experiences. Explore Renaissance-era palaces, enjoy a glass of the town’s most famous drop of red, the Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, or venture further to picturesque Pienza or the hot springs of Bagno Vignoni.
offer_address: Via Poggio Alla Sala 10, Montepulciano, Tuscany 53045, Italy

title: Tuscan Wellness Retreat in UNESCO Thermal Spa Town with Daily Breakfast & Resort Credit
description:
Situated in the picturesque town of Montecatini Terme, this rejuvenating sanctuary is characterised by wellness-centred luxury and timeless Tuscan design. Melt stress away at the Home SPA with a four-hand massage, or unwind in the Turkish bath cocooned in a lush bamboo grove. The hotel's farm-to-table philosophy shines in its two restaurants, offering organic ingredients to nourish body and mind.

Steps away from the Tettuccio Thermal Baths, Palazzo Belvedere sits in the heart of Tuscany's most healing landscape. Spend your days wandering Montecatini's verdant parks, or hop on a train to Florence within an hour to marvel at the Duomo and Michelangelo's masterpieces. The surrounding hills are perfect for hiking, cycling or simply enjoying the beautiful rolling countryside.
offer_address: Viale Fedele Fedeli 10, Montecatini Terme, Tuscany 51016, Italy

vendor_name: Renaissance Tuscany II Ciocco Resort & Spa
title: Tuscany Hillside Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Three-Course Dinner
description: Embark on a romantic Italian escape to the Tuscan countryside, staying amid the rolling hills of the beautiful Serchio Valley at Renaissance Tuscany Il Ciocco Resort & Spa by Marriott. Less than two hours from Florence and Pisa, this spectacular property is surrounded by 1,500 acres of landscaped grounds, guaranteeing dramatic scenery from all angles. Soak in the world-famous Tuscan sunshine as you lounge poolside overlooking the picturesque countryside, indulge with a trip to the Beauty Spa and feast on authentic dishes and wine at La Veranda. When you're ready to explore, discover the spectacular history, produce and artistic flare of the region in the charming nearby towns dotted like jewels throughout the undulating countryside.
location_description: Renaissance Tuscany Il Ciocco Resort & Spa
offer_address: Via Giovanni Pascoli, Castelvecchio Pascoli, Barga, Lucca 55051, Italy

title: Italian Charm in Historic Siena, Tuscany
description: Explore Italy’s beautiful Tuscany region including historic Siena, Florence, Pisa and more when you stay at Hotel Executive, located just outside Siena's magnificent old town. Includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly free-flow alcoholic drinks between 6pm and 11pm (including Italian classic Aperol Spritz!), one three-course dinner with drinks for two, one 30-minute massage per person, a one-hour walking tour of Siena and a pass to all the museums in the city.
offer_address: Via Nazareno Orlandi 32, Siena 53100 Tuscany Italy

vendor_name: Hotel Tenuta di Artimino Meliá Collection
title: Tuscan Heritage Retreat near Florence with Daily Breakfast & Wine Tasting
description:
Enter a little piece of heaven at this undiscovered jewel, originally built in 1596 as a large hunting lodge by Ferdinando I De Medici, the Grand Duke of Tuscany. Soothe your spirit by the pool with a glass of local Chianti, treat yourself to a hot stone massage, dine at gourmet restaurant Biagio Pignatta and watch the countryside blend into a scene capturing the essence of la dolce vita.

This hotel's prime location is a gateway to the best of Tuscany. You're surrounded by the rolling hills, fertile vineyards and abundant olive groves that make this region so famous. Between moments of wellness at the resort, take a stroll to the charming village of Artimino or visit the nearby Medici Villa La Ferdinanda, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
location_description: Hotel Tenuta di Artimino Meliá Collection
offer_address: Viale Papa Giovanni XXIII 1, Artimino, Tuscany 59015, Italy

title: Romantic Tuscan Escape in the Italian Countryside
description: Holiday under the Tuscan sun with a fairy-tale escape at Villa Cassia di Baccano, located just one hour from Florence and close to Sienna, Pisa and Lucca. Indulge with a wine and olive tasting, a 10% discount at the wine shop and hotel’s restaurant as well as free parking and Wi-Fi. Get lost in the brilliant streets of Florence with a walking tour led by an English-speaking guide and upgrade to enjoy an optional trip to the charming Cinque Terre.
offer_address: Via Venezia, 111 52024 San Giustino Valdarno - Arezzo

title: Italian Charm in the Tuscan Countryside
description: Holiday under the Tuscan sun with five nights of gourmet produce and fine wines staying at UNA Palazzo Mannaioni, located just an hours’ drive from Florence, Pisa and Siena. Includes daily breakfasts, one dinner of the finest local produce, prosecco on arrival, a wine tasting experience with cheese and salami, and more.
offer_address: Via Guglielmo Marconi, 2, 50050 Montaione FI, Italy

title: 19th-Century Tuscany Villa with Michelin-Starred Restaurant, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Three-Course Dinner
description:
Experience the serenity of Tuscany when you stay at Il Patriarca, a boutique villa that exudes 19th-century Italian elegance. Expect verdant vineyards and honeyed stone architecture, alfresco lounging areas and beautiful gardens. Incredible facilities include a sparkling outdoor pool and two restaurants: the Michelin-starred I Salotti del Patriarca and La Taverna, where delicious Tuscan fare is served in ancient cellars. Whisk your loved one away for a romantic getaway and find out what old-world glamour feels like in this divine retreat that features just 22 guest rooms. Spend your days strolling through nearby vineyards, discover hidden cellar doors and savour local produce at this opulent retreat.

What's more, the jewels of this corner of Tuscany like Pienza, Montepulciano, San Quirico d'Orcia, Bagno Vignoni and Chiusi are just a hop and a jump away. If you're looking to travel further afield, Rome, Florence and Pisa are all within close reach.
offer_address: Strada Statale 146, Località Querce al Pino, Chiusi, Siena 53043, Italy

vendor_name: Renaissance Tuscany II Ciocco Resort & Spa
title: Tuscany Hillside Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Three-Course Dinner
description: Embark on a romantic Italian escape to the Tuscan countryside, staying amid the rolling hills of the beautiful Serchio Valley at Renaissance Tuscany Il Ciocco Resort & Spa by Marriott. Less than two hours from Florence and Pisa, this spectacular property is surrounded by 1,700 acres of landscaped grounds, guaranteeing dramatic scenery from all angles. Soak in the world-famous Tuscan sunshine as you lounge poolside overlooking the picturesque countryside, indulge with a trip to the Beauty Spa, and feast on authentic Italian dishes and wine at La Veranda. When you're ready to explore, discover the spectacular history, produce and artistic flare of the region at the charming nearby towns, dotted like jewels amid the undulating countryside.
location_description: Renaissance Tuscany Il Ciocco Resort & Spa
offer_address: Via Giovanni Pascoli, Castelvecchio Pascoli, Barga, Lucca 55051, Italy

title: Tuscan Villa Romance in Heritage-Listed Val d’Orcia with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & EUR80 Credit
description:
Located in the rolling hills of Val d’Orcia, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, this utterly blissful five-star retreat is your gateway to the beauty of Tuscany. This historic Medici villa, a proud member of The Leading Hotels of the World, offers breathtaking panoramic views of vineyards and olive groves.

Renowned for its natural thermal springs, Fonteverde Lifestyle & Thermal Retreat features a world-class spa with multiple indoor and outdoor pools, where mineral-rich waters emerge at 42°C, providing a world of therapeutic benefits.

Wake to breakfast with landscape views at La Corte Restaurant, spend nights sipping wine at Bar il Falconiere or slink into plush seats for dinner at Ferdinando I Restaurant, housed inside a Renaissance-era portico.
offer_address: Località Terme, 1, 53040 San Casciano dei Bagni SI, Italy

title: Italy: Historic Pisa Wellness Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & EUR80 Hotel Credit
description:
Once the Grand Duke of Tuscany's thermal playground, this five-star palace still radiates 18th-century grandeur - think original frescoed vaults and marble masterpieces that whisper centuries of stories. What was once one of Europe's most important thermal centres now welcomes modern wanderers seeking that perfect blend of royal treatment and contemporary extravagance.

Chef Umberto Toscano works his magic across two stellar dining spots: the Byron Court Terrace where fragrant fruit trees frame Pisan hill views, and Dei Lorena Restaurant, where kings and queens once dined. Whether you're sipping bespoke cocktails at The Shelley Bar or soaking in natural thermal springs, every corner hums with artistic refuge vibes.

Beyond the bubbling thermal springs and pristine pools lies a thermal cave with ancient healing waters that have been working their magic since the 1700s. The historic Kaffehaus colonnade crowns the hill, offering a picture-perfect backdrop, while panoramic viewpoints invite you to bask in the rolling beauty of the Tuscan landscape.
offer_address: Largo P. B.Shelley 18, San Giuliano Terme, Pisa 56017, Italy

title: Heritage Tuscany Boutique Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Two-Course Dinner
description: Fall in love with Tuscany's spellbinding serenity with a heritage stay at Il Patriarca, a boutique villa that exudes 19th-century Italian elegance. Lush vineyards rest alongside sun-kissed stone architecture, alfresco lounging areas, perfect gardens and a spectacular outdoor pool. Dining at Il Patriarca is a triumph, with two restaurants promising limitless epicurean delights - head to La Taverna del Patriarca for traditional Tuscan fare or I Salotti del Patriarca for Michelin-starred gourmet candlelit dinners showcasing the region's extraordinary produce.
offer_address: Strada Statale 146, Località Querce al Pino, Chiusi, Siena 53043, Italy

title: Coastal Escape in Tuscany's Spectacular Argentario Region
description: Step back to a time of old Hollywood glamour, staying at the hillside Hotel Torre di Cala Piccola - a chic hideaway favoured by Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton for its spectacular panoramic views and proximity to the charming seaside towns of Tuscany’s Argentario region. Enjoy daily continental buffet breakfast, a three-course welcome dinner on your first evening, a two-course lunch overlooking the sea, an 'aperitivo' welcome drink each on arrival, complimentary parking and dining discounts.
offer_address: Via Della Cala, 58019 Porto Santo Stefano GR, Italy

title: Countryside Tuscany Escape with Daily Breakfast & EUR60 Dining Credit
description:
Fall in love with Tuscany's spellbinding serenity with a heritage stay at this boutique villa that exudes 19th-century Italian elegance. Lush vineyards stretch as far as the eye can see alongside alfresco lounging areas that invite quiet contemplation. Surrounded by a large park and beautiful hilly views, the villa's perfect gardens burst with fragrant herbs and flowers, leading to a spectacular outdoor pool.

Here, dining is a triumph with two restaurants promising limitless epicurean delights. Head to La Taverna del Patriarca Restaurant for hearty, traditional Tuscan fare served in a rustic setting, or ascend to culinary heights at I Salotti del Patriarca Restaurant, recommended by the Michelin Guide, where excellence meets romantic candlelit ambience.
offer_address: Strada Statale 146, Località Querce al Pino, Chiusi, Siena 53043, Italy

title: Boutique Tuscany Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Free-Flow Drinks & Siena Cathedral Complex Pass
description: Rich history, diverse culture, and ultra-modern facilities collide in the boutique Executive Hotel Siena, positioned in an idyllic neighbourhood near Siena's city centre. Enjoy Tuscan and Fiorentina specialties in the hotel's authentic restaurant, venture out to the medieval Piazza del Campo a short walk away, or explore beautiful Tuscany, famed for its 14th-century architecture and art, lively café scene, wineries and grand museums. Discover the treasures of the surrounding areas, including old Siena's Duomo di Sienna with statues by Michelangelo and Donatello, Florence, Pisa and the numerous vineyards and olive groves the region is famous for at your leisure.
offer_address: Via Nazareno Orlandi 32, Siena 53100, Tuscany, Italy

Verdant vineyards rest alongside honeyed stone architecture, alfresco lounging areas, perfect gardens and a spectacular outdoor pool. title: 🌿CONSCIOUS COLLECTION: Charming Tuscan Escape Amid an Eco-Certified, Centuries-Old Winery
description: Embrace the laid-back lifestyle of the striking Tuscan countryside staying in a beautifully restored farmhouse, nestled amid the vineyards of one of the region’s most renowned wineries: Tenuta di Capezzana. You are set to experience a quintessentially Italian holiday in this secluded, family-run estate located only an hour's drive from Florence. Slow down the pace as you enjoy daily breakfast, a wine-tasting at the on-site winery, a complimentary bottle of wine, 10% discount at the wine shop and at the property’s restaurant and an exclusive Florence walking tour with an English-speaking guide.
offer_address: Via Capezzana, 100, 59015 Carmignano PO, Italy

title: Tuscan Village Stay with Indulgent Wine and Dining Inclusions
description:
Soak up the beauty and history of Tuscany, staying in a prime location within driving distance of Florence, Pisa and Rome at the historic Laticastelli Country Relais - a hilltop resort surrounded by nature and offering breathtaking countryside views.

Your escape includes daily continental buffet breakfast, a four-course dinner with wine, coffee and water, an Italian wine-tasting experience, a complimentary bottle of wine to share, weekday access to the thermal baths of Rapolano, a EUR50 credit towards an Italian cooking lesson and 15% discount on food at the hotel's restaurant.
offer_address: Via Laticastelli, 1, 53040 Rapolano Terme SI, Italy

title: Enchanting Southern Tuscany Manor House Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Wine Tasting
description:
Be immersed in southern Tuscany's rich cultural heritage with a picturesque retreat to a recently renovated 1950s manor house. In an elegant blend of tradition and modernity, this Tuscan haven offers the ideal place for peaceful countryside relaxation, with the Cedar SPA completing your dream wellness escape. From candle massages to facial scrubs, you are sure to find the perfect treatment to balance the body and mind. To complement your treatment, take a dip in the jacuzzi or try out the Turkish bath, before indulging in local dining at the hotel's restaurant, offering local produce and exquisite dishes. Finish off your day with a local wine or refreshing Aperol Spritz at the hotel's Lounge Bar.

Beyond the hotel, explore winding cobblestone streets, marvel at iconic landmarks or wander through the picturesque Tuscan countryside on a scenic hike. Nestled on the slopes of striking Monte Amiata, you're perfectly located to explore Florence, Pisa, Rome and other historic towns, or you can explore nearby vineyards, olive groves and eateries.
location_description: Grand Hotel Impero Wellness & Exclusive SPA
offer_address: 7 Via Roma, Castel del Piano, Grosseto 58033, Italy

description: Live la dolce vita on Italy’s stunning Tuscan coastline staying at the seafront Versilia Lido | UNA Esperienze. Holiday like the Italians do in this popular seaside destination within easy reach of Florence, Lucca, Pisa, Forte dei Marmi and the iconic Cinque Terre. Includes daily buffet breakfast, two three-course meals, welcome drink and cocktails.

title: Tuscany Heritage Countryside Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
On the outskirts of ancient Montepulciano - renowned for its spellbinding hillside views, medieval terraces and legendary vineyards - stands Precise Tale Poggio Alla Sala, a sanctuary of rustic luxury among Tuscany’s rambling countryside. Magnificent touches abound - spectacularly painted frescos reach towards vaulted ceilings, traditional flourishes accent the building’s natural charms and sun-kissed terraces gaze longingly over lush gardens. Return from days exploring the countryside to playful Tuscan plates at La Via Della Seta, sip aperitifs by the shimmering outdoor pool or allow the hotel’s master sommeliers to guide you on a journey through the region’s rich viticultural heritage.

title: Tuscany Hillside Estate Romance Near Lucca with Daily Breakfast, Pasta-Making Class & Wine Tasting
description:
Embark on a romantic Italian escape to the Tuscan countryside, staying amid the rolling hills of the beautiful Serchio Valley at a luxurious 1950s estate. Less than two hours from Florence and Pisa, this spectacular property is surrounded by 1,500 acres of landscaped grounds, guaranteeing dramatic scenery from all angles overlooking hillside villages and local orchards.

Soak in the Tuscan sunshine as you lounge poolside overlooking the sweeping vistas, indulge with a trip to the Beauty Spa and feast on authentic dishes and wine at La Veranda. When you're ready to explore, discover the spectacular history, produce and artistic flare of the region in the charming nearby towns dotted like jewels throughout the undulating countryside.

Spend your afternoon at La Salette for an intimate demonstration the fine art of homemade pasta-making, paired with authentic Italian desserts, and complimentary tastings. For a sample of regional drops, indulge in a bespoke wine-tasting experience, savouring the unique flavours of two local bottlings while gazing across the romantic hillside.

offer_address: Via Giovanni Pascoli, Castelvecchio Pascoli, Barga, Lucca 55051, Italy

vendor_name: Renaissance Tuscany II Ciocco Resort & Spa
title: Tuscany Countryside Haven with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Three-Course Dinner
description:
Disconnect and surrender to tranquillity with a luxurious stay at the Renaissance Tuscany Il Ciocco Resort & Spa - a romantic jewel framed by the lush mountains of the Serchio Valley. This gorgeous property is perfectly located in the Lucca countryside and is surrounded by 1,700 acres of landscaped grounds, so you can expect dramatic scenery from all angles. Make the most of every minute and unwind as you make use of the exceptional onsite facilities including an indoor and outdoor pool, a luxurious resort spa and two restaurants: the sun-drenched La Veranda and chic yet welcoming Nour Lounge, where eclectic Tuscan fare is served.

When it's time to leave your idyllic hideaway, days are spent exploring the Italian countryside either by hike or horseback, discovering the nearby historic towns of Lucca and Barga, or sipping on hearty Tuscan reds at nearby vineyards. For adventures further afield, be sure to visit Florence, Pisa, and Cinque Terre to unearth the many charmed found within these famed towns.
location_description: Renaissance Tuscany Il Ciocco Resort & Spa
offer_address: Via Giovanni Pascoli, Castelvecchio Pascoli, Barga, Lucca 55051, Italy

title: Rural Getaway in 19th-Century Tuscan Villa with Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: Discover the delights of rural Tuscany with a stay at Il Patriarca, a 19th-century Italian villa, transformed to offer boutique accommodation and Michelin-starred restaurant I Salotti. Hire a car and discover the stunning surroundings, including Montepulciano (30-minute drive), Rome (1 hour 40 minutes’ drive) and Florence (90-minute drive). Included in your escape is an automatic upgrade to a Superior Room with complimentary mini bar, daily breakfast, nightly three-course dinner, a welcome drink and more.
offer_address: Chiusi SI IT, SP146, 53043 Querce al Pino SI, Italy

title: Stay in an Old Medieval Village Amongst Beautiful Countryside with Daily Breakfast, Indulgent Three-Course Dinner & Wine Tasting
description: Soak up the beauty and history of Tuscany, staying in a prime location within driving distance of Florence, Pisa and Rome at the historic Laticastelli Country Relais - a hilltop resort with breathtaking countryside vistas. Your escape includes daily continental buffet breakfast, a three-course dinner including wine, coffee and water, an Italian wine-tasting experience, a complimentary bottle of wine to share, weekday access to the thermal baths of Rapolano, one 50 euro credit towards an Italian cooking lesson and a 15% discount on dining in the hotel restaurant.
offer_address: Via Laticastelli, 1, 53040 Rapolano Terme SI, Italy

title: Tuscany Five-Star Oceanfront Luxury with Onsite Beach Club
description:
Soak up the postcard-perfect views of Tuscany's coastline at the five-star Baglioni Resort Cala del Porto, part of the prestigious The Leading Hotels of the World collection. Overlooking the yacht-lined Punta Ala Marina, this exceptional resort invites lazy days of waterfront relaxation. Visit the pebbled cove at Cala Martina, hike up to the Castello di Punta Ala or ask the friendly staff for help planning an excursion, from a yacht trip to Elba Island to a swing on the golf course or an exciting Vespa tour.

The onsite La Spiaggia Beach Club is an oasis of waterfront luxury, where the Tuscan Sea unfurls before you and shaded sunbeds beckon. When hunger strikes, visit La Spiaggia Restaurant or Belvedere Restaurant for a refined culinary experience or hit the bar for a cocktail and snacks. The Kids' Club is on hand to take care of little ones while you make the most of the onsite wellness facilities, including a spa offering Natura Bissè treatments.
offer_address: Via Cala del Pozzo, 58043 Punta Ala, Castiglione Della Pescaia GR, Italy

title: Boutique Tuscan Countryside Self-Contained Villas with Welcome Drink & Local Olive Oil
description: Escape to dreamy Tuscany to find a hedonistic haven in a Borgo 69 self-contained villa, an exclusive escape nestled among verdant rolling hills of the Italian countryside. Bask in the boundless vineyards, thriving olive groves and charming hilltop towns from the comfort of the resort’s shimmering infinity pool,  and taste the region with delicious farm-to-table dishes at Emporio di Ines, which uses fresh produce from the property’s magnificent gardens. Chat to the friendly concierge to organise enriching experiences like cycling tours, wine tastings and truffle hunting, all designed to truly experience the top-notch Tuscan treatment.
offer_address: Via Ponte al Ramo, 69, 52045 Pozzo della Chiana AR, Italy

title: Charming Tuscany Wine Country Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Among the romantic rolling hills of Tuscany, you'll find the charming 18th-century Relais Villa Grazianella, standing solitary and proud amid a patchwork of vineyards and neat rows of cypress trees. A short distance from Montepulciano, this picturesque region is renowned for its great wine, ornate Renaissance architecture and rustic Italian fare.

Elegant rooms and suites all boast breathtaking views out to the vineyards and distant mountains, while interiors pay tribute to traditional Tuscan design without forgoing modern comforts. Dine in the garden or inside the villa’s restaurant, where typical Tuscan dishes are served with local wines. Take a dip in the outdoor swimming pool, set amid lush gardens and silvery olive trees. The best part? You can taste the rich history of the region at the onsite wine cellar and tasting room, showcasing the territory's significant red wines, from aromatic chianti to sweet Vin Santo.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Wake up to delicious **daily breakfast**
- Toast your escape with a welcome **bottle of wine** (for stays of 2+ nights)
- Sample the region’s finest drops with a **wine tasting for two** (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Take a journey through Tuscan cuisine with a **tasting menu dinner for two** (for stays of 7+ nights)

**Suite Upgrade:** For an indulgent Tuscan stay, upgrade to a spacious Suite with a jacuzzi bathtub, lounge area with fireplace and plush four-poster king bed.
offer_address: Via Grazianella, 5, 53045 Acquaviva SI, Italy

title: Tuscany Hilltop Castle Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Spa Credit
description:
Fall in love with the soul-stirring beauty of Tuscany from Castello di Velona Resort, Thermal Spa & Winery, a renovated 11th-century fortress perched on a hilltop overlooking the verdant olive groves and vineyards of Val d'Orcia, a 15-minute drive from Montalcino. Part of the prestigious Leading Hotels of the World collection, this luxurious heritage property offers the chance to immerse yourself in the dolce vita lifestyle, indulge in Italian cuisine at nearby Michelin-starred restaurants and discover the charming cities and towns of the Tuscany region.

This stunning property offers a collection of unique rooms that perfectly fuse historic architecture with contemporary touches. Indulge at three onsite eateries, treat yourself at the OLISPA wellness oasis, work out at the fitness centre, sample the wines and olive oil of the estate and vineyard, and relax at the vast thermal pool complex, boasting indoor and outdoor facilities overlooking the surrounding countryside and vineyards.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages/nights):**

- Start each morning with a delightful **daily breakfast**
- Celebrate your stay with a **welcome drink on arrival**
- Indulge with **EUR50 spa credit** per person, per stay
- **Complimentary room upgrade**, subject to availability (excludes Suites)
- Treat yourself with **EUR75 dining credit** per person, per stay (for stays of 5+ nights)
- Prolong your relaxing escape with **4pm late checkout**, subject to availability (for stays of 5+ nights)

**Looking for added luxury?** Upgrade to a beautiful Suite in the historic part of the castle, with exposed beams, a separate living area and luxe marble bathroom.
location_description: Castello di Velona Resort, Thermal Spa & Winery
offer_address: Strada Provinciale della Badia di Sant'Antimo, 53024 Castelnuovo dell'Abate SI, Italy

title: Romantic Tuscany Escape with Private Olive Grove, Outdoor Pool & Tennis Courts
description: Picturesque valley views and historic country charm are just the beginning of the romantically luxurious offerings at Fontelunga Hotel & Villas. Stroll across pristine gardens, past the private olive groves, with your loved one or take a bike ride through the lush wilderness surrounding this breathtaking, centuries-old property. Dive deep into a moment of relaxation with a dip in the sparkling outdoor pool or enjoy a friendly hit of tennis as the sun sets.
offer_address: Via Cunicchio N5, Foiano della Chiana, 52045 Arezzo, Italy

title: Five-Star Tuscany Escape Just One Hour from Pisa with World-Class Spa & 27-Hole Golf Course
description:
If you’re looking for an authentic Italian experience in the Tuscan countryside, then this secluded haven - just an hour outside of Pisa and Lucca - may be the perfect place for you to taste la dolce vita. Surrounded by thick olive groves, vineyard-cloaked valleys and lush hills, the stunning Toscana Resort Castelfalfi is the perfect base to fall in love with all provincial Italy has to offer.

A one-of-a-kind showcase of the Italian lifestyle, the sprawling resort is complete with a long list of five-star facilities. Wine and dine on authentic cuisine across six gourmet restaurants and bars, tee-off on the 27-hole golf course, take a dip in the heated indoor and outdoor swimming pools and unwind at a blissful spa self-proclaimed to be 'Tuscany's best spa' with a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath and sensory showers. Plus, this retreat is home to its very own olive oil and wine estate and boasts numerous activities to help you embrace the Italian culture, including cooking classes and truffle hunting (charges apply). When the time comes to leave your luxe hideaway, you could visit the beautiful cities of Pisa, the ‘cradle of the Renaissance’ Florence, San Gimignano and Volterra.
offer_address: Località Castelfalfi, 50050 Montaione, FI, Italy
